title: Scalable one-pot synthesis of amorphous iron-nickel-boride bifunctional electrocatalysts for enhanced alkaline water electrolysis
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE01073F, Paper
Bennett Schmitt, Eva Murphy, Sinny J. Trivedi, Qiancheng Zhang, Brian J. Rodriguez, Aran Rafferty, Raman Bekarevich, Gabor Ersek, Giuseppe Portale, M. Veronica Sofianos
Making green hydrogen cost effective by scalable iron nickel boride bifunctional electrocatalysts that can easily reach industrial current densities.
